channel.title: Adding the master command?
channel.description: hi ive seen command makers but they dont make commands like master to max all skills how do you make these and where to put them ???

item.title: Adding the master command?
item.dc:creator: @sasquiotch sasquiotch
item.description:
@sasquiotch wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && (playerRights >= 2)) 
{
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);

addSkillXP(14000000, 24);
sendMessage("You cheating ASS!");
}

add is somewhere around your other commands
